name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Dexter PITTS, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Dexter PITTS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER, CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of February, 2008, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner, is:
Did the Superior Court err in creating new Turner requirements sua sponte in finding counsel’s letter defective for failing to address issues that [respondent] never raised and that were not apparent from the record?
opinions.author: PER, CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
942 A.2d 893
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Dexter PITTS, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 13, 2008.
